basics.name: Aris Carlos
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2025.

work.summary: Team member working in the AI and Automation Team
highlights: Research and develop approaches to automating the classification of CVEs using AI/ML methods

work.summary: Intern performing research for the Naval Information Warfare Center
highlights: Performed research on Quantum Key Distribution (publication still pending)
Presented findings to the local members of the U.S. Congress
Provided critical technical translations to be further analyzed and disseminated
Analyzed foreign language materials with colleagues to engage different perspectives on key information

volunteer.summary: Mentor assisting students in the CyberPatriot program at Moanalua High School
Student leader contributing to the growth of Cybersecurity Education at UH Manoa

volunteer.organization: Association for Computing Machinery at UH Manoa (ACManoa)
volunteer.summary: Student leader assisting in Discord communications and various event planning

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship is an automatic $2,000-$4,000 scholarship per year for four years of undergraduate study for first-time degree-seeking students. Students must have a 3.8 GPA upon the time of application to UH MƒÅnoa.

awards.title: Certificate of Recognition for Promotion and Support
awards.awarder: UH Manoa Information and Computer Sciences Department
awards.summary: Awarded for exceptional service in promoting and supporting the growth of the Information and Computer Sciences Department

awards.title: Gold
awards.awarder: Family, Career and Community Leaders of America (FCCLA)
awards.summary: Awarded Gold for 'Students Taking Action with Recognition (STAR)' Event, Food Innovations category at the 2022 National Leadership Conference in San Diego

awards.title: Second Place
awards.awarder: ISC2 Hawai'i Chapter and Validity Hawai'i
awards.summary: Awarded for second place standing on the leaderboards in the 2022 CyberPatriot Invitational Capture-the-Flag (CTF) event

awards.title: Valedictorian
awards.awarder: Hawai'i Department of Education and Moanalua High School
awards.summary: Awarded for graduating with a cumulative GPA of 4.0+ and the completion of the Career and Technical Education honors
